products.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Stockholm mocha brown roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 7.39 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Stockholm mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. 
 
As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Rimini, Chocolate - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, chocolate - roller blind you'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate bri
products.productdescription: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office. It would also work well as a window feature in an otherwise plain bathroom or hallway.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo blackout latte brown roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 7.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This soft latte brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This light brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Stirlo Chocolate Brown
products.metadescription: Made to measure stirlo chocolate brown roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlochocolate brown plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Burst Brownie Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Burst brownie roller blind. A dim out, wipe clean blind that can be made to over 3m. Perfect for every room in the house.
products.productdescription: The dark, dulcet tones of the burst brownie are a work of art, filling the room with that warm, rich energy for which it is named. With the sun behind it, this blind will fill the room with a gorgeous yet restrained brown glow that will make you feel like you are stepping into a bath of melted milk chocolate.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash taupe brown electric roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash taupe brown electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The soft light brown roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.  At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product id: db-erbx2074 fabric colour: taupe brown material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash mocha brown electric roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 133.32 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. 
 
 This splash mocha brown electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The dark bown of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
